question: Who among the following is the writer of the book ‘The Big Reverse: How Demonetization Knocked India Out’?
explanation: The name of the writer of the book ‘The Big Reverse: How Demonetization Knocked India Out’ is Meera Sanyal who died recently. She contested the Lok Sabha election from Mumbai twice. She gave up the post of chief executive of the Royal Bank of Scotland and joined Aam Admi Party.
